public ref class DatePicker : Microsoft::Maui::Controls::View, Microsoft::Maui::Controls::IElementConfiguration<Microsoft::Maui::Controls::DatePicker ^>, Microsoft::Maui::Controls::Internals::IFontElement, Microsoft::Maui::IDatePicker

type DatePicker = class inherit View interface IFontElement interface IElementConfiguration<DatePicker> interface IDatePicker interface IView interface IElement interface ITransform interface ITextStyle

remarks.para: The visual representation of a DatePicker is very similar to the one of , except that a special control for picking a date appears in place of a keyboard.

example.para: The example below creates a working that displays the current date and allows the user to select a date between the specified ranges. The value for the property is specified with the x:Static markup extension, and the and properties are specified by calling the method with the x:FactoryMethod and `x:Arguments` tags. Note: the example below requires a namespace declaration in the root ContentPage or ContentView tags. In particular, xmlns:sys="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" must appear in the attribute list for the root element, so that the XAML parser can resolve the name, sys:DateTime.
